title: My computer blue screens
body:
I haven't played for a while and then i updated and every time i start a game it goes trough these following steps

1. I join/create a game
2. It goes to champ select
3. It loads to 100% on every player
4. The screen card crashes and the screen goes black
5. It goes to blue screen and resets the computer if i dont shut it down in the CTRL + ALT + delete (aka. Task manager)

This happens every time i try to join a game.
I know that my computer is crap. Its a old Laptop with Vista but it can run LOL with like about 4-10 FPS and i can play with that. But before it has worked but now its like 
Me: pls i wanna play /w my friends
LOL: Sure (smugface)
Me: YAY. It has loaded to 100%
LOL: F you u arnt playing anything m8. Imma gonna crash you computer and blue screen it.

Pls help fast i wanna play /w my firends LOL
First i didn't like it very much but after like two games i fell i love with it.

replies.body:
Blue screens are typically a good sign of some sort of critical hardware/OS failure. League isn't quite intensive enough to cause your operating system to crash, which is basically what a blue screen means. 

If trying to play League is the only thing that causes it, let's try a [**full reinstall**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040) to make sure that corrupted game files aren't causing it.
